meanings.definition: Food that is easy to eat or snack on.
meanings.sent1: I packed some munchables for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The party platter was filled with delicious munchables.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they grabbed the munchables from the table.
meanings.sent4: The munchables disappeared from the plate in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful array of munchables tempted everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: Items that are suitable for snacking.
meanings.sent1: The store offers a variety of munchables for customers.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps a stash of munchables in her desk drawer.
meanings.sent3: The munchables in the vending machine were a hit with the office staff.
meanings.sent4: The munchables on the menu were perfect for sharing with friends.
meanings.sent5: The movie night snacks included all our favorite munchables.

meanings.definition: Edible items that can be consumed quickly and easily.
meanings.sent1: During road trips, we like to have munchables in the car.
meanings.sent2: The convenience store had a section dedicated to munchables.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her purse was a treasure trove of munchables.
meanings.sent4: The campers gathered around the fire, roasting munchables on sticks.
meanings.sent5: The flight attendant offered passengers a selection of munchables.
